channel.title: How would I go about
channel.description: How would I enter, and what specifically would I enter, into the console, in order to spawn an object into my inventory, like, just for an example, a rune bar or a dragon helm. What lines do I enter into the console specifically?

item.title: How would I go about
item.dc:creator: @ChillScape ChillScape!
item.description:
@ChillScape wrote:

ok for the item dragon help either typ ::pickup 1149 1000
ok lemme explain this the ::pickup alwas do it with the two :: and the 1149 is the item id meaning 1149 is dragon helm and 1000 is how maney of em you want in your invitory but for it to work like for the 1000 to work just typ 1150 insted of 1149 because 1150 is noted dragon helms ok hoped this helped! :D!

Read full topic
